name: Which "Queer As Folk" Character is it? Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which character played the violin during season 3?
questions.explanation:
Ethan.

	Fabrizio Filippo played Ethan during this season.  He was a love interest for Justin.

questions.text: Which of the following gentlemen started up a catering business together?
questions.explanation:
Vic and Emmett.

	With Vic's ability to cook and Emmett's ability to decorate the two felt it was a good combination to start up a business together.

questions.text: What is the name of Michael, Melanie and Lindsay's new daughter that was born at the end of season 4?
questions.explanation:
Jenny.

	Jenny Rebecca was born while most of the gang was gone to Canada on a charity bicycle ride.

questions.text: What is the name of the male prostitute that Michael and Ben became foster parents for?
questions.explanation:
Hunter.

	Michael and Ben met Hunter when he was hustling outside of their apartment building.  Ben became very fond of him and wanted to help him so they became his foster parents.

questions.text: What is the name of Vic's boyfriend?
questions.explanation:
Rodney.

	Vic moved in with Rodney which created a lot of problems with his sister, Debbie.

questions.text: What is the name of Justin's mother?
questions.explanation:
Jennifer.

	Sherry Miller has played Jennifer Taylor during all four seasons of the show.  She can also be seen in the miniseries "Kingdom Hospital".

questions.text: Which of the characters is an attorney?
questions.explanation:
Melanie.

	Michelle Clunie portrays the hardcore attorney Melanie Marcus.  She and Lindsay have two children together, Gus and Jenny.

questions.text: Which of the guys dated a chiropractor?
questions.explanation:
Michael.

	Michael dated Dr. David Cameron during the first season.  Dr. Dave and Michael moved to Oregon to be closer to his son.  Things did not work out because Michael came back and went back to work for the Big Q.

questions.text: What is the name of Debbie's boyfriend who is a police officer?
questions.explanation:
Carl.

	Debbie got to know Carl when he was investigating a murder that happened outside of the Liberty Diner.

questions.text: Which of the following characters had NEVER been a couple through the first four seasons of the show?
questions.explanation:
Brian and Ted.

	Although Ted had a fantasy about Brian in one of the episodes, they had never been a couple.
